text: Neil Faulkner ( 1957 â€“ February 2022) was a British archaeologist, historian, writer, lecturer, broadcaster, and political activist. In 2019, Faulkner appeared on BBC Radio 4's programme In Our Time to discuss Lawrence of Arabia. Faulkner was a Marxist and a revolutionary socialist activist. He was a member of the Socialist Workers Party, from 1980 to 2010. Faulkner was diagnosed with a rare form of blood cancer in mid-2021.
